scripts.dev: dotenv -e .env.development -- node scripts/validate-env.mjs && dotenv -e .env.development -- next dev
scripts.build:staging: cross-env APP_ENV=staging NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.staging -- node scripts/validate-env.mjs && cross-env APP_ENV=staging NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.staging -- next build
scripts.build:production: cross-env APP_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production -- node scripts/validate-env.mjs && cross-env APP_ENV=production NODE_ENV=production dotenv -e .env.production -- next build
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: dotenv -e .env.development -- npx prisma migrate dev --name init_schema
scripts.prisma:migrate:indexes:dev: dotenv -e .env.development -- npx prisma migrate dev --name add_indexes_for_optimisation
